name: wunstr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c1)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c1)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(crn(c1)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crn(c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(crn(c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(crn(c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1))))
-| wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wss(cfv(c0, c1), cuni(crn(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cslot(c3))

comment: Closure of a structure index in a weak universe. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
